item.title: SELEZIONE CINECA N.13/2024 – Project Manager (PMO Delivery Manager)
item.description:
Il Cineca Consorzio Interuniversitario indice una selezione per la copertura di n.4 posizioni con qualificate competenze professionali per attività di delivery management all’interno della Direzione Tecnologia, Sistemi e Infrastruttura

From: 11-03-2024 13:00
To: 02-04-2024 12:00
Category: AVVISI

Il Cineca Consorzio Interuniversitario indice una selezione per la copertura di n.4 posizioni con qualificate competenze professionali per attività di delivery management all’interno della Direzione Tecnologia, Sistemi e Infrastruttura.


Il Delivery Manager sarà responsabile della gestione dei programmi e progetti di sviluppo applicativo, di upgrade infrastrutturale e di messa in esercizio di soluzioni software all’interno dell’ufficio PMO tecnico di CINECA. Collaborerà con altri leader di dipartimento per definire, prioritizzare e sviluppare i programmi e progetti. Sarà incaricato di pianificare la gestione dei programmi e progetti, stabilire scadenze, assegnare compiti ai membri del team e analizzare dati finanziari, inclusi budget e risorse. Inoltre, garantirà che le iniziative rispettino gli standard aziendali, siano allineati ai budget e rispettino le scadenze.


Testo dell'avviso

item.title: CINECA SELECTION n.14/2024 - High Performance Computing (HPC) - HPC Scientific Application Front-end/Back-end Engineer
item.description:
The CINECA Interuniversity Consortium announces a selection for 5 permanent positions with qualified professional skills, to be included within the HPC Structure

From: 14-03-2024 15:00
To: 08-04-2024 12:00
Category: AVVISI

The CINECA Interuniversity Consortium announces a selection for 5 permanent positions with qualified professional skills, to be included within the HPC Structure.


Tender notice


Work environment and context The HPC Department of CINECA provides the Italian and European scientific community with the most advanced high-performance computing resources, data processing, data management and data preservation systems and tools, specialized scientific technical skills and technology transfer, with the aim of maintaining and supporting the competitiveness of national public and private research. The main supercomputing systems of CINECA are ranked in the highest positions of the “Top500”, the list of the most powerful supercomputers in the world.


CINECA actively contributes to key national and European initiatives in High Performance Computing and data management infrastructure and development, playing a pivotal role as a primary partner in project initiatives within this domain.


CINECA HPC Department provides a very international and inclusive working environment, with a strong team cohesion. With around 150 employees of different nationalities our working languages are Italian and English.  


The figures sought will be included in the teams involved in the ongoing projects in which CINECA participates as a partner, in many as well as first contractors, including: the activation and development of the cutting-edge technological infrastructures of the “Bologna Technopole”, the development of the Supercomputer EuroHPC "Leonardo", PNRR collaborations (EU Recovery and Resilience Facility), numerous European actions (currently about 50 - among which we mention collaboration with ECMWF, EUROFusion and EUDAT, participation in the Centers of Excellence for application domains relating to the study of new materials, of the terrestrial geophysical system, of complex engineering systems, of Human Brain Project, Destination Earth ...). CINECA also has active collaboration with the Italian and European academic system and with the major national research bodies including: CNR, ENEA, INFN, OGS, ICTP, INGV, SISSA and INAF and shares numerous activities with various public bodies (regional and national) of the system of services aimed at public administrations. CINECA also has collaboration and development agreements in place with some of the major Italian industries and with numerous small and medium-sized enterprises. Part of the positions may contribute to the new collaboration with Italian Ministry of Culture on the Digital Library.


For a more detailed idea of the activities currently carried out by the HPC Department, you can refer to the latest HPC Report available .


Regarding the PNRR positions, it is possible that some of the position may be directly involved in the following projects: “National Centre for HPC, Big Data and Quantum Computing - ICSC (CUP: D56G22000380006 – Project proposal: CN00000013), National Biodiversity Future Center - NBFC (CUP: D52C22000930006 – Project Proposal: CN00000033), Ecosystem for sustainable transition of EmiliaRomagna - ECOSISTER (CUP: B83D21014180006 – Project Proposal: ECS00000033), Growing Resilient, INclusive and Sustainable -GRINS (CUP: D83C22001280001 – Project proposal: PE0000018); Digital Driven Diagnostics, prognostics and therapeutics for sustainable Health care – D34Health (CUP: B53C22005960001  – Project Proposal: PNC0000001).

item.title: Cineca Selection N. 8/2024 - High Performance Computing (HPC)
item.description:
The CINECA Interuniversity Consortium announces a selection for n.30 permanent positions with qualified professional skills, to be included within the HPC Structure.

From: 14-02-2024 16:00
To: 05-03-2024 12:00
Category: AVVISI

The CINECA Interuniversity Consortium announces a selection for n.30 permanent positions with qualified professional skills, to be included within the HPC Structure.


Tender notice 


Work environment and context


The HPC Department of CINECA provides the Italian and European scientific community with the most advanced high-performance computing resources, data processing, data management and data preservation systems and tools, specialized scientific technical skills and technology transfer, with the aim of maintaining and supporting the competitiveness of national public and private research. The main supercomputing systems of CINECA are ranked in the highest positions of the “Top500”, the list of the most powerful supercomputers in the world.


CINECA actively contributes to key national and European initiatives in High Performance Computing and data management infrastructure and development, playing a pivotal role as a primary partner in project initiatives within this domain.


CINECA HPC Department provides a very international and inclusuve working environment, with a strong team cohesion. Wth around 150 employees of different nationalities our working languages are Italian and English.


The figures sought will be included in the teams involved in the ongoing projects in which CINECA participates as a partner, in many as well as first contractors, including: the activation and development of the cutting-edge technological infrastructures of the “Bologna Technopole”, the development of the Supercomputer EuroHPC "Leonardo", PNRR collaborations (EU Recovery and Resilience Facility), numerous European actions (currently about 50 - among which we mention collaboration with ECMWF, EUROFusion and EUDAT, participation in the Centers of Excellence for application domains relating to the study of new materials, of the terrestrial geophysical system, of complex engineering systems, of Human Brain Project, Destination Earth ...). CINECA also has active collaboration with the Italian and European academic system and with the major national research bodies including: CNR, ENEA, INFN, OGS, ICTP, INGV, SISSA and INAF and shares numerous activities with various public bodies (regional and national) of the system of services aimed at public administrations. CINECA also has collaboration and development agreements in place with some of the major Italian industries and with numerous small and medium-sized enterprises. Part of the positions may contribute to the new collaboration with Italian Ministry of Culture on the Virtual Library.


For a more detailed idea of the activities currently carried out by the HPC Department, you can refer to the latest HPC Report available.


Regarding the PNRR positions, it is possible that some of the position may be directly involved in the following projects: "National Centre for HPC, Big Data and Quantum Computing - ICSC (CUP: D56G22000380006 - Project proposal: CN00000013), National Biodiversity Future Center - NBFC (CUP: D52C22000930006 - Project proposal: CN00000033), Ecosystem for sustainable transition of Emilia-Romagna - ECOSISTER (CUP: B83D21014180006 - Project proposal: ECS00000033), Growing Resilient, INclusive and Sustainable -GRINS (CUP: D83C22001280001 - Project proposal: PE0000018); Digital Driven Diagnostics, prognostics and therapeutics for sutainable Health care - D34Health (CUP: B53C22005960001 - Project proposal: PNC0000001).

item.title: Selezione Cineca PER TIROCINANTI
item.description:
Il Cineca ricerca brillanti tirocinanti da inserire in percorsi formativi specialistici all'interno delle varie Strutture aziendali

From: 06-05-2022 13:00
To: 19-02-2028 12:00
Category: AVVISI

I candidati ideali sono neolaureati che hanno maturato anche breve esperienza nel settore richiesto, con ottime capacità di problem solving, predisposizione al lavoro di team e orientamento al raggiungimento dei risultati.


Si offre l’opportunità di inserimento in un contesto strutturato ed altamente tecnologico, attraverso un percorso formativo di tirocinio che permetterà di acquisire competenze tecniche specialistiche e potenziare le soft skills.


E’ possibile inviare la propria candidatura spontanea selezionando dal menu a tendina l’ Area di interesse


Posizioni di Staff (HR, Controllo di Gestione, Amministrazione e Finanza, Legale e Gare, Facility)


Sei un brillante neolaureato motivato ad intraprendere un percorso formativo e professionale all’interno delle funzioni di Staff?


Sei orientato/a al problem solving e al lavoro di gruppo e sei motivato/a al raggiungimento dei risultati? Sei la persona che stiamo cercando!


Area Tecnologica (Analisi, Sviluppo e Controllo Qualità del Software, Infrastruttura Tecnologica)


Siamo alla ricerca di brillanti neolaureati e laureandi in discipline STEM per le nostre Aree di Sviluppo Prodotti, Innovazione e Infrastruttura Tecnologica.


Sei appassionato di analisi, sviluppo software o sistemi? Desideri intraprendere un percorso professionale in un contesto dinamico e volto all’innovazione tecnologica con l’utilizzo delle moderne tecnologie? Sei la persona che stiamo cercando!


Area HPC


Siamo alla ricerca di brillanti neolaureati e laureandi con background scientifico/ingegneristico, interessati al mondo del supercalcolo, intelligenza artificiale, analisi di Big Data e simulazioni numeriche.


Ti appassionano le tecnologie all’avanguardia nell’ ambito di Supercalcolo?  Sogni di intraprendere un percorso professionale in ambito HPC? Sei orientato/a al lavoro di gruppo e sei motivato/a al raggiungimento dei risultati? Sei la persona che stiamo cercando!


Area Consulenza (Supporto, Service, Outsourcing, Project Management)


Siamo alla ricerca di brillanti neolaureati in ambito economico, scientifico e tecnico-ingegneristico.


Ti appassiona la risoluzione dei problemi?Ti consideri una persona con forti capacità analitiche e ottime doti relazionali? Ritieni di avere buone capacità di ascolto attivo?Sei orientato/a al lavoro di gruppo e sei motivato/a al raggiungimento dei risultati? Sei la persona che stiamo cercando!
